name: Chaotic Pong
description:
Chaotic Pong is Pong but the multiverse is collapsing and everything is falling apart and now different parts of the arena are merging together and affecting the game in super crazy ways!

But you still gotta win the game! You can't let him beat you like this. Your ego won't let you. Fight.. Fight! Fight to your last breathe! Fight until your legs give! Fight until your enemies fall! Or perish.

Made for the Interstellar Game Jam 4: Another Dimension.

==========

How to Play:

Player 1:

Up and Down Arrow Keys to Move

Player 2 (if playing local co-op):

W and S key to Move

==========

Additional Credits:

Music by FoxSynergy
